{{cpp/error/error_category/title|default_error_condition}}
{{cpp/error/error_category/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 | 1=
virtual std::error_condition default_error_condition( int val ) const noexcept;
}}

Returns the error condition for the given error value.

Equivalent to {{c|std::error_condition(val, *this)}}.

Classes derived from {{tt|error_category}} may override this function to map certain error values to a generic category. For example, {{lc|std::system_category}} overrides this function to map the error values that match POSIX {{lc|errno}} values to {{lc|std::generic_category}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | val | error value for which to return error condition}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The error condition for the given error code.
